author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10027] Bug Fix : The CompoundRowPrefixFilter needs to sort the prefixes before we initialize the state.
Summary: The filter state needs to be set after the list of prefixes are sorted. This avoids any possible errors.

author: liyin
msg: [0.89-fb][HBASE-10425] Hacky way to create a table on specified subset of machines
Summary: should not affect existing code
Test Plan: added unit test: TestHackyCreateTable; ran TestAdmin too - nothing is ruined

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10360] Auto initialized all the HRegionLocations even though the forceFetch is false.

The HTable.getCachedHRegionLocations(false) only returns all the cached HRegionLocations based on the original design. Per discussions with Calypso team, we decided to enhance the API so that even though the forceFetch is set as false, if the HRegionLocations for that table has not been initialized yet, it will fetch all the HRegionLocations from the META table.
This enhancement has been implemented in HConnectionManager instead of HTable layer. Therefore, multiple HTable instances for the same table could share this "initialized" state.

author: liyin

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10437] Adding interface change to Filter to incorporate Bloom filter optimizations via the filter.
